blog.name: that-one-nerd-over-yonder
blog.title: Sup,
blog.description: "We're In Love With The Invention, We Don't Love The Inventor" -Andy Mineo

body:
Unpopular Kpop opinions

-Just a disclaimer, I’m not the end all be all on all Kpop knowledge. I’m truly a baby stan. These are just opinions.

1. I don’t really like BTS army. They’re like super toxic and rude and anti black and etc. Also some of them act as if BTS is the only group deserving of anything (and yes I know, not all Army, and they’ve done some good stuff for BTS, but still)

2. BTS (to me) have yet to top The Most Beautiful Moment In Life era. Wings is the second

3. I like The 8’s mullet. I think he’s the only one I accept that I feel looks good

4. Kpop is heavily influenced by black music. Which is why it hurts (black fans the most) to see the blatant disregard of black culture and people

5. Kpop idols are people. Quit treating them like your property. Especially when it comes to things like dating.

6. I think BTS is deserving of what they have. They’re not overrated, they’re overhyped.

7. Pentagon’s “Shine” was a wonderfully cute song with and adorable video and dance that perfectly described what it’s like to have a crush and I wish it got wins at awards shows and more recognition.

8. Y'all can have your preferences of BGs over GGs but some of y'all take it to far and are just plain sexist

9. Cute concepts are great

10. If a Kpop idol can keep up with the dances they’re given, then they can dance. Period. They have some hard fricken dances. Just because some members in the group are better dancers than others doesn’t mean that the others are crappy dancers, it means they have room to grow. Which they eventually will.

11. I feel like this ones a common sense, but Kpop industry is super sexist.

12. Don’t force people into stanning a group or member. If they want to, they will.

13. Black fans shouldn’t always have to be the ones educating everytime an idol does something antiblack and offensive. It’s tiring and weary. If they wanna not stan someone then let them.

14. Seventeen is probably one of my favorite groups to stan. I just really like them

15. Loona is great, I love them, and I can’t wait

16. I’m pretty that when an idol lip sings in like some of their performances, it doesn’t mean they can’t sing. You also have to remember, they’re dancing like crazy. It’s not really a good defense in arguing about which group is better cause they all do it

17. Fans wars are so freakin stupid.

18. Shinee is so great

19. Please stop doing things like “As an Army, as a Exol, as an etc.” in regards to other groups. I saw people do this a lot when Jonghyun died which is kinda messed up.

20. I love BlackPink, but I feel like Rose is making her voice really pitched when she’s singing and not singing her natural voice, if that makes sense. Idk if it’s for the specific songs she has to sing or what

21. I don’t really care for Red Velvet’s Wendy

22. I do like Red Velvet though

23. Quit comparing groups to other groups. I’ve seen so many people comparing Stray Kids to BTS and I’m like “please stop”.

24. I’m not really a fan of Kmusicandblackwomen either

25. Kpop fanfics make me legitimately uncomfortable. Like no hate to the writers it just makes me uncomfortable

26. Quit over sexualizing underage idols (and kinda idols in general)

27. SM’s unlimited members for NCT is dummmmbbbbb

-if I remember more I’ll add. Remember I’m not the end all be all on these. They’re just opinions, don’t take it too much to heart.

caption: (x)

tags: Sad yoongi my love don't cry
title: I'm not strong...
body:
Yoongi : I need to have strength, I need to be strong. I need to be as strong as you!
You : I'm not strong...
Yoongi : You are and I need you, I need you to be my strength. I-I want to be strong!
You : You already are, Yoongi! You are and I love you *you hug his back tighter*

dialogue.name: Yoongi
dialogue.label: Yoongi :
dialogue.phrase: I need to have strength, I need to be strong. I need to be as strong as you!

dialogue.name: Yoongi
dialogue.label: Yoongi :
dialogue.phrase: You are and I need you, I need you to be my strength. I-I want to be strong!

dialogue.name: You
dialogue.label: You :
dialogue.phrase: You already are, Yoongi! You are and I love you *you hug his back tighter*
